alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown in a vat with speed-aging technology.

alienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown failure
alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown in a vat with speed-aging technology, but something went wrong.

alienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown failure
alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown in a vat with speed-aging technology, but something went wrong.

alienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown failure
alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown in a vat with speed-aging technology, but something went wrong.

alienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Vatgrown failure
alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was grown in a vat with speed-aging technology, but something went wrong.

alienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pleasure den worker
alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a pleasure den as a "companion". For a few Bits, [PAWN_pronoun] would show you the time of your life.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Medical experiment
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was experimented on relentlessly by doctors. This left [PAWN_objective] horrifically mutilated.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Arcade manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Following the resurgance of arcades, [PAWN_nameDef] was tasked to manage and maintain a full arcade.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exonet vlogger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Famous on many Glitterworlds, [PAWN_nameDef] Vlogged almost every moment of [PAWN_possessive] lives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exonet cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] hosted a show on the Exonet about cooking. With [PAWN_possessive] help, many people learned the basics of cooking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hyper gladiator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in many games of strength and skill for entertainment of the masses. Dangerous, but the thrill is unlike anything else.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mega-farm tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] tended to crops on a Mega-Farm. They often worked hand in hand with the Ranchers to keep a healthy ecosystem.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Asteroid miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] mined for minerals on asteroids large and small for their MegaCorp.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exonet librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained a database of data on the Exonet. Interestingly, this is one of the more dangerous jobs that Syntho had. The data [PAWN_nameDef] managed was widely sought.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Janitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a janitor in a ultrastructure. Most days were uneventful, and boring but some days... some days... well they were all uneventful and boring.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] created many works of art out of stone, clay and wood. Some good, some bad, all art.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] raised and cared for many animals on a Mega-Farm. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] felt like they were barely above the creatures [PAWN_pronoun] cared for.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Competitive shooter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days in the shooting range practicing their aim. Professionally, [PAWN_pronoun] never went far but their skill is far greater than even some Enforcers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Natural artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] planted, cultivated, trimmed and created unconventional art using plants as [PAWN_possessive] medium.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: VR pornstar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] showed [PAWN_possessive] bits for Bits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Unlicensed pharmacist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] bought and sold illegal drugs on the lower levels to make a living.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Crypto banker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] processed transactions for Cryptocurreny banks. While computers are fast and nearly completely accurate, banks require people like [PAWN_nameDef] to validate transactions to prevent cybersecurity breaches.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Code dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] bought and sold exclusive and often illegal code, usually stolen from rival megacorperations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exile
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] did something terrible and was exiled from society because of it. [PAWN_possessive] does not wish to talk about it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Revolutionist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a revolution to free [PAWN_possessive] people. [PAWN_pronoun] was forcibly removed from their world because of it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitter mechanic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] maintained many machines, big and small, for a megacorporation. The gears of life would halt if it weren't for [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Water purity enforcer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped purify water for the populace. Without [PAWN_possessive] and many others assistance, there would be no clean water.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Living furniture
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to pose and be used as a piece of furniture for most of their lives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Living art piece
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The Synthetic Life traveling art troupe was well known on many worlds. [PAWN_nameDef] was part of the main attraction, the still life exhibit.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Demolitionist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Sometimes, to create, you must destroy. [PAWN_nameDef] did just that. Utilizing a large selection of explosives to demo buildings both old and... "unnecessary".

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Syntho dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made their way buying and selling their own kind on the black market. Some called [PAWN_objective] a traitor, [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the term "entrepreneur".

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Undercity miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a freelance miner. Mining out old buildings for their unclaimed metals and rock beneath the main levels of the world above.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitter chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a chef for a very rich Glitterworlder. [PAWN_pronoun] knowledge of exotic foods is unrivaled by all but the best.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitter security
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an Enforcer employed by a megacorporation. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most days patrolling private sectors, preventing rival megacorp employees or otherwise unauthorized individuals from gaining valuable intel.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Runner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Runner. Tasked with delivering sesitive packages that simply cannot be transported in the public eye, [PAWN_pronoun] took whatever path was necessary to safely and securly deliver to [PAWN_possessive] mark.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gas giant diver
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Deep within the core of gas giants lies valuable deposits of hydrogen, helium and water. Using a specalized ship, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] team dove deep into them to collect these materials.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thermospherical Botanist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Above the atmosphere, but below space, [PAWN_nameDef] cultivated plants for consumption on the planet below.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Isolated Farmhand
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: On a distant and unpopulated world, [PAWN_nameDef] was employed by a megacorp to tend to several acres of land, as well as the animals and plants on it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Animal Genetic Purifier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] carefully pruned the dna of countless animals to ensure that the intense exposure to the background radiation of space did not cause any long term problems for their kin.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blackmarket Gunsmith
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Sometimes, you just need a gun. When that situation arrives, [PAWN_nameDef] can help you. Unless you are an Enforcer.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Asteroid Artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Using advanced mining equipment, albeit heavily altered, [PAWN_nameDef] created wonderful works of art for space stations to admire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Interstellar Contractor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a hand in building or designing nearly every space station and orbital in their home system.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sweatshop worker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was practically a slave. Forced to work 16 hour days with no joy time for countless years, they have developed more than their fair share of mental blocks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exotic Taxidermist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] perserved alien species, both sapient and not, in the ancient art of taxidermy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Kibble production supervisor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: It's not glamourous but someone has to feed the countless animals kept on glitterworlds. [PAWN_nameDef] ensured that every animal could eat, even with nearly every type of flora and fauna being extinct.
